channel.title: Help with enviromental variable
channel.description:
I did what the tutorial said and when i try to run silibs client i get the same thing
C:\Downloads>JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0 'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
C:\Downloads>pause Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Help with enviromental variable
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

I did what the tutorial said and when i try to run silibs client i get the same thing

C:\Downloads>JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0
‘JAVA’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.

C:\Downloads>pause
Press any key to continue . . .
